name: Block Witch
description:
Block Witch is a colourful puzzle game in which the player controls one of 7 witches to complete levels filled with puzzles and obstacles! 

The 7 witches go on a journey to find their grandfather who has mysteriously gone missing. 

- Find your way to the goal by moving - and not stopping until hitting a wall - in 50 test levels! 

- Many types of obstacles such as enemies, tiles, openable gates, and more! 

- Each witch is a master in different kinds of witchcraft with unique abilities solve puzzles and defeat enemies! 

- Quirky cast of characters is brought to life with wacky dialogue and cut-scenes as the player progresses the story, even with short dialogues playing during the levels.

Full Playthrough
